name: Zen Pinball 2 PS Vita
description:
Zen Pinball 2 is a one-stop location for all your favorite pinball content. Simply upgrade to Zen Pinball 2 and all of your tables will receive more advanced ball physics, a deeper social experience and stunning stereoscopic 3D for FREE!

Zen Pinball 2 features the critically acclaimed Marvel Pinball series, Zen Pinball Classics, and an exciting lineup of individual DLC. With a pinball library of 26 tables and more coming all the time, Zen Pinball 2 is the premiere pinball platform on PlayStation®Network.

Full list of features:

-Compete against other players to achieve the highest ProScore™, and team up with your friends to increase your TeamScore™
-Exciting multiplayer modes, including local split-screen and hotseat multiplayer, online, and worldwide tournaments
-New tables released regularly through the PlayStation®Store
-Share your scores on Facebook
-New rule sheets to help you achieve higher scores
-Trophies for each table

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.


1 player(s)
24678KB Minimum
